articles.title: Greater Boston town issues guidance after bobcat sighting
articles.description:
“We’ve had a few documented bobcat sightings over the last several years, much like this week’s sighting—a bobcat, minding its own business, simply passing through a property,” said Dedham Animal Control.

The post Greater Boston town issues guidance after bobcat sighting appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Dedham Animal Control reported a bobcat sighting this week, typical for the area.
Residents are advised to remain calm as bobcats are generally non-aggressive.
Guidance issued to ensure safety for pets and children in the community.

articles.title: Alex Cora gives an early preview of Red Sox 2026 lineup
articles.description:
"It just happened that for the first time in years what you see early is what you’re probably going to see on Opening Day.”

The post Alex Cora gives an early preview of Red Sox 2026 lineup appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Alex Cora previews the Red Sox 2026 lineup, indicating stability for fans.
Cora suggests the Opening Day roster will closely resemble early spring training.
Boston residents can expect a familiar team structure for the upcoming season.

articles.title: Live updates: What to know about the nor’easter hitting Massachusetts
articles.description:
Meteorologists are predicting up to 2 feet of snow and high winds, which could affect trees and power lines.

The post Live updates: What to know about the nor’easter hitting Massachusetts appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Meteorologists predict up to 2 feet of snow in Boston starting February 22.
High winds may cause power outages and damage to trees and power lines.
Residents should prepare for hazardous travel conditions and potential emergency services delays.

articles.title: Bruins react to McAvoy, Swayman’s gold-medal win over Canada
articles.description:
"With what he’s been through this year, and a little bit of last year, very happy for him for sure.”

The post Bruins react to McAvoy, Swayman’s gold-medal win over Canada appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Charlie McAvoy and Jeremy Swayman won gold with Team USA at the Olympics.
McAvoy's resilience this year highlights his significant personal journey.
Their victory boosts local pride and support for the Bruins in Boston.
